mapper.select:
select
from sys_tracklog where session_id = #{sessionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and ip = #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by access_time desc limit 0, 1
select count(*) from sys_tracklog where access_time >= #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and access_time < #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}

id,
session_id,
ip,
page,
user_name,
access_time,
stay_time,
device_type,
os,
browser,
browser_version,

mapper.update:
update sys_tracklog
session_id = #{sessionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ip = #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
page = #{page,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
access_time = #{accessTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
device_type = #{deviceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
os = #{os,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
stay_time = #{stayTime,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
browser = #{browser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
browser_version = #{browserVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}
